tips.title: Turn Off Tap While Brushing
tips.description: Don't let water run while brushing teeth

tips.title: Use Basin for Dishes
tips.description: Fill a basin with soapy water instead of running tap

tips.title: Full Load Washing
tips.description: Only run washing machine with full loads

tips.title: Water Early Morning
tips.description: Water plants in early morning to reduce evaporation

tips.title: Install Low-Flow Showerhead
tips.description: Replace regular showerheads with low-flow models

tips.title: Dual-Flush Toilet
tips.description: Install dual-flush toilet or retrofit existing one

tips.title: Keep Drinking Water Cool
tips.description: Store water in refrigerator instead of running tap

tips.title: Use Mulch
tips.description: Apply mulch around plants to retain moisture

tips.title: Monitor Water Meter
tips.description: Check water meter regularly for leaks
